rules_text:
When Lost Resistor dies, you gain 1 life.
Cybersoul {X}{X}{W} [i]({X}{X}{W}: Transform this. Each artifact you tap while activating pays for {1}. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
When this creature transforms into Splintered Soul, create X 3/1 colorless Cyborg Soldier artifact creature tokens.
Whenever Splintered Soul or another Cyborg you control dies, you gain 1 life.
